job_description: We are seeking an Incident Response Analyst with 3+ years of hands-on IR experience. Responsibilities include leading incident investigations, coordinating response efforts across teams, training junior analysts on forensics techniques, and reducing mean time to detect/respond. Strong knowledge of MITRE ATT&CK, forensic analysis, and threat hunting required. Team collaboration skills essential.

achievements_with_metrics.responsibility: Led forensic investigations and incident response across enterprise infrastructure
Implemented threat hunting program using MITRE ATT&CK framework
Trained incident response team on forensic analysis and containment procedures
Coordinated cross-functional response to critical security breach
